attributes.action: 99 year old NHS fundraiser Captain Tom Moore to be rewarded by the government.
attributes.additional_details: It will show that you honour and respect people who are committed, people who are wonderful examples of love and service. He represents everything good about Britain. He deserves to be called a hero. He deserves the wonderful memories you could give him.
attributes.background: To recognise and acknowledge this man who has served his country and is doing so now. For his compassion, dedication and spirit. He deserves our respect and admiration.

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
